snippet: Toyota Motor said it would stop making cars and engines in Australia by the end of 2017, which would cause the loss of thousands of direct and indirect jobs.
lead_paragraph: Toyota Motor said it would stop making cars and engines in Australia by the end of 2017, which would cause the loss of thousands of direct and indirect jobs.

headline.print_headline: Toyota Plans To Halt Manufacturing In Australia
headline.main: Toyota Plans to Halt Manufacturing in Australia
